Humaspro KLU Raih Silver Winner Anugerah IPRI 2019
03 Nov 2019, 17:06 by Hayatun Sofian


Humaspro KLU Raih Silver Winner Anugerah IPRI 2019

KBRN, Lombok Utara : Bagian Humas dan Protokol Setda Kabupaten Lombok Utara meraih penghargaan Silver Winner Kategori Kepala Bagian Humas Kabupaten pada ajang Insan Public Relations Indonesia (IPRI) 2019 dalam The 5th JAMPIRO (Jambore Public Relations Indonesia) yang dihelat di Sanur Denpasar Bali pekan lalu.
Penghargaan tersebut diberikan langsung oleh Senior Public Relations Indonesia sekaligus Founder abd Director EGA Briefings Elizabeth Goenawan AnantoApresiasi Jambore PR Indonesia merupakan event tahunan dengan tujuan melahirkan para praktisi PR terbaik dan meneruskan generasi PR berkualitas dengan mengapresiasi peran dan kinerja insan kehumasan Indonesia melalui proses penilaian dan presentasi komprehensif terhadap kiprah baktinya dalam menunaikan fungsi public relations dan komunikasi publik. Selain penyampaian program dan kegiatan sebagai corong pembangunan dan pemerintahan kepada masyarakat. Founder dan CEO PR Indonesia Group Asmono Wikan mengatakan, humas berperan penting dengan menunaikan peran komunikasi publik dalam suatu lembaga dan instansi. Ditambahkannya, melalui penghargaan tersebut pihaknya ingin menjadi bagian dari katalisator bagi humas pemerintah maupun public relations hingga berfungsi strategis dengan memanajemen instansinya masing-masing. "Kami ingin Humas pemerintah tidak sekadar menjadi tenaga praktikal yang sangat teknis. Namun harus pula menyampaikan pesan dan visi pemerintah dalam membangun negeri sehingga terwujud harmonisasi," tuturnya, Minggu (3/11/2019).Runutan penilaian penjurian hingga seorang praktisi humas atau public relations terpilih sebagai nominator. Diawali dengan fase pengajuan portofolio kehumasan hingga tanggal 2 Oktober. Kemudian presentasi di hadapan para panelis Pakar Public Relations Indonesia pada tanggal 14 oktober 2019 di Jakarta hingga penyampaian undangan penganugerahan awarding Insan PR Indonesia tanggal 31 Oktober 2019.Pemberian penganugerahan IPRI itu didahului dengan workshop Public Relations, menghadirkan narasumber para Pakar PR terkemuka Indonesia dalam kegiatan bertajuk Harmoni Komunikasi untuk Negeri. Kepala Bagian Humas dan Protokol Setda KLU Mujaddid Muhas, M.A mengutarakan, pencapaian penghargaan itu merupakan tuah dari proses. Hasil sinergi kinerja tim kehumasan bersama pewarta dan stakeholders lainnya. “Atas keberhasilan itu, dirinya menyampaikan terima kasih yang tulus kepada segenap pihak yang turut andil dalam interaksi serta manajemen program kegiatan kehumasan,” paparnya.Menurut Dedy, sapaan akrabnya, upaya yang dilakukan Bagian Humas dan Protokol diantaranya mendiseminasi pemberitaan dan komunikasi secara kontinyu sebagai bentuk tanggungjawab dengan menyampaikan sejumlah program, kegiatan, dan kebijakan agar dapat tersampaikan dan dapat diketahui masyarakat.Ditambahkannya, selama ini Bagian Humas dan Protokol menyebarluaskan berbagai kegiatan pemda melalui pelbagai media seperti media cetak, elektronik, online, media sosial maupun media ruang publik, termasuk di dalamnya membangun relasi dengan pewarta media. Di samping itu, pihaknya senantiasa berupaya merawat dan menjalankan pendulum tupoksi mandat secara profesional dan semangkus-sangkil mungkin, melalui pelaksanaan kebijakan pimpinan daerah, aspirasi atau saran para pewarta serta usulan dari korsa kehumasan di internal Humas dan Protokol KLU. "Terima kasih pimpinan daerah, terima kasih para kadis dan jajarannya. Terima kasih rekan-rekan pewarta dan semua stakeholder atas interaksi dan sinerginya sehingga bisa sampai pada pencapaian demikian," tuturnya.Sebelumnya, pada bulan Agustus 2019 di Tangerang Banten, Humaspro Setda KLU juga menerima tropi dan penghargaan dalam dua kategori, yaitu Best Leader Supporting PR and Communications, dan Terpopuler di Media Online 2019.

Humaspro KLU Wins Silver Winner IPRI Award 2019
03 Nov 2019, 17:06 by Hayatun Sofian


Humaspro KLU Wins Silver Winner IPRI Award 2019

KBRN, North Lombok: Public Relations and Protocol Section of North Lombok Regional Secretariat won the Silver Winner award in the category of Head of District Public Relations at the Indonesia Public Relations (IPRI) 2019 event in The 5th JAMPIRO (Jamboree Public Relations Indonesia) held at Sanur Denpasar Bali last week .
The award was given directly by Indonesian Senior Public Relations as well as EGA Briefings Founder Director Elizabeth Goenawan Ananto. The Indonesian PR Jamboree appreciation was an annual event with the aim of giving birth to the best PR practitioners and continuing the generation of quality public relations by appreciating the role and performance of Indonesian public relations people through a comprehensive assessment and presentation process on the gait of his devotion in carrying out the functions of public relations and public communication. In addition to delivering programs and activities as a mouthpiece of development and governance to the community. PR Indonesia Group Founder and CEO Asmono Wikan said, public relations plays an important role by fulfilling the role of public communication in an institution and agency. He added, through the award, his party wanted to be part of the catalyst for government public relations and public relations to function strategically by managing their respective institutions. "We want government public relations not only to be a very technical practical workforce. But we also have to convey the message and vision of the government in developing the country so that harmony can be realized," he said, Sunday (11/03/2019). The judging assessment link to a public relations practitioner or public relations was chosen as the nominee. It starts with the public relations portfolio submission phase until October 2. Then the presentation was before the panelists of Indonesian Public Relations Specialists on October 14, 2019 in Jakarta until the presentation of the invitation for the awarding of Indonesian PR People awarding on October 31, 2019. The awarding of the IPRI was preceded by a Public Relations workshop, presenting speakers from leading Indonesian PR experts in the event titled Harmony of Communication for the Country. The Head of the Public Relations and Protocol Section of the KLU Secretariat, Mujaddid Muhas, M.A, said that the achievement of the award was the luck of the process. The result of a synergy between the public relations team and reporters and other stakeholders. "For that success, he expressed his sincere thanks to all those who contributed to the interaction and management of public relations programs," he explained. According to Dedy, his nickname, the efforts made by the Public Relations and Protocol include disseminating information and communication continuously as a form of continuous communication. responsibility by delivering a number of programs, activities, and policies so that they can be conveyed and known to the public. He added, up to now the Public Relations and Protocol Division disseminates various regional government activities through various media such as print, electronic, online, social media and public space media, including in in building relationships with media reporters. In addition, his party always strives to maintain and carry out the mandate of the tupoksi mandate in a professional and as rigorous way as possible, through the implementation of regional leadership policies, aspirations or suggestions from reporters as well as proposals from the public relations department in internal public relations and the KLU Protocol. "Thank you regional leaders, thank the cadres and staff. Thank you fellow journalists and all stakeholders for their interaction and synergy so that they can reach such an achievement," he said. Previously, in August 2019 in Tangerang Banten, Humaspro Regional Secretariat KLU also received trophies and awards in two categories, namely Best Leader Supporting PR and Communications, and Most Popular in Online Media 2019.
